name: Spectrum Arcade
description:
Download Spectrum Arcade and enter the world-wide war to see which team will reign! Spectrum Arcade is a collection of quick, fun, classically-inspired arcade games that you can play alone or against anyone in the world! Sign up and you'll instantly be placed on one of 8 teams with the sole purpose of earning as many Points as you can for your team by playing one of many fun games. Challenge members of other teams to beat your scores, wager Points, and defeat opponents to score big! Use Power Cards to get the advantage over others in PvP competition.

Features:
- Free Sign Up
- No In-App Purchases required for full gameplay
- Nearly 2-dozen leaderboards
- Add 10 Friends
- Enjoy 30 simultaneous challenges
- Levels change to reflect team and challenges

Free Games:
- Block Block
- Blastro Smash
- Roller Balls
- Space Squares
- Puzzle Plop

Unlockable Games:
- Roller Quest
